Name: Full Pitch
About the game: Full Pitch is a classic arcade-alike game with vibrant retro style graphics and simple controls that offer depth and mastery to players who seek it. Your progress will be tracked and your highest score displayed on the start screen. Do your best to beat your own and your friend's highest scores. You can use the edge of the screen to warp from edge to edge for advanced movement to maintain your run. There is no limit to how much you can warp, so use this power at will. Full Pitch also has Steam leaderboard support. Compete against your friends for a high score, or shoot for a place on the global leaderboards.
